text: Ezɨ gɨn mɨdorozir igharazir mam ua Getɨn nguibar ekiamɨn oto. Gumazir bar dafar ruaribar ovavir borir mam uaghan iti, egha a gumazir ruarir dafam. Ezɨ an dafarimning vaghvagha 6plan dafarir puziba iti, ezɨ an dagarimning uaghan kamaghɨra 6plan dagarir puziba iti. Da bar moghɨra 24plan puziba.
